【考法 1】adj. 粗鲁的，愚钝的：so crude and unrefined as to be lacking in discrimination and sensibility
【例】 crass receptionist
【近】 coarse, crude, rude, incult, uncouth, vulgar
【反】 civilized, polished, refined, urbane. genteel 有教养的
